p: As shown in Figure 6, there was a linear relationship (RÂ² = 0.94, p-value <0.0001) between FNT 50 performed in Vero and A549 cells. Thus, human epithelial A549 cells are suitable for the measurement of ZIKV-neutralizing antibodies in serum specimens based on our newly developed MR766 GFP-based FNT.
